allow:

Bash(for branch in cleanup/remove-duplicate-files feature/daisyui-refactoring feature/development-preparation feature/file-import-integrations feature/simplified-risk-creation-flow feature/stage-all-changes fix/build-errors-integration-imports fix/code-review-improvements feature/notion-rcsa-spreadsheet)

Bash(HUSKY=0 git push origin --delete cleanup/remove-duplicate-files feature/daisyui-refactoring feature/development-preparation feature/file-import-integrations feature/simplified-risk-creation-flow feature/stage-all-changes fix/build-errors-integration-imports fix/code-review-improvements feature/notion-rcsa-spreadsheet)
